paper_abstract: Model-checking problems for PDL (propositional dynamic logic) and its extension PDL boolean AND (which includes the intersection operator on programs) over various classes of infinite state systems (BPP, BPA, pushdown systems, prefix-recognizable systems) are studied. Precise upper and lower bounds are shown for the data/expression/combined complexity of these model-checking problems.
paper_title: Infinite state model-checking of propositional dynamic logics
